price: Ushyira mu gaciro muri bo aravuga ati “Sinari nababwiye ko iyo muza gusingiza (Allah mukanamushimira, mukanavuga muti: In-sha-Allah, mutari guhura n’ibi byago)?”
arabic: قَالَ أَوۡسَطُهُمۡ أَلَمۡ أَقُل لَّكُمۡ لَوۡلَا تُسَبِّحُونَ

version.title: Kinyarwanda Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Kinyarwanda by The Rwanda Muslims Association team.

meta.transliteration: qāla awsaṭuhum alam aqul lakum lawlā tusabbiḥūna
